questions.quote: Well, I'm sure you did. Who wouldn't love a pony? Who wouldn't love a person that had a pony?
Get those clothes off. You're going to spend the night and we're going to cuddle.
Well if you watch closely enough, you just might see me.  I'll be the one waving to the camera from my seat on the forty yard line.
We had a little fight this afternoon.  Let's bury the hatchet. We smoke um peace pipe.
You see! You see what I'm saying to you? It's a presence! It's the beast!
Good. Cause if this is a lie, if this is a joke, if this is your idea of some cute little game… we're finished!
Because of Divola! Get in here... How come you're not dressed?
Listen you're just imagining things. He doesn't know a thing. Now come on. Pull yourself together.
Y'know what you should do now? Get her some flowers, smooth it out.
Not a chance. I'm afraid I'll just have to find someone else to accompany me on my journey. The dark continent is no place for an addict, Elaine.
